job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-16T18:09:35.000Z", "description": "

Data Scientist

tl;dr: An innovative seed-stage startup in the DevSecOps space is looking for a Data Scientist to join our team and help design and build NLP and anomaly detection models and algorithms using bleeding edge technology.


Our tech-stack and R&D culture

As this is a greenfield application, we do not have all the details ironed out, you will help us do that. However, we\u2019ll probably be using some of these:

\u25cf      Databricks / Apache Spark / Presto / Hive / Athena for data wrangling

\u25cf      PyTorch / TensorFlow / Keras / Scikit-learn for ML/DL

\u25cf      AWS as a cloud provider

\u25cf      Python and Jupyter notebooks well, for everything


We will be putting a high emphasis on:

\u25cf      Honing your skills

\u25cf      Non-blocking automatic MLOps CI/CD pipeline

\u25cf      Letting data scientists research and not distract them with endless unneeded meetings

\u25cf      Involvement and impact on the decision making process and roadmap of a new product

\u25cf      Open-source use and contribution


One of the challenges of data scientists is getting data, you\u2019ll have all the data you need, and then some.

 

What do we expect you to bring to the table?

We believe that for every highly functioning relationship, there must be a good synergy between the partners and that it must be a win-win situation for all.

Our key requirements are:

\u25cf      Enjoy your work and working with your team and be proud of it

\u25cf      Assume best intentions \u2013 we know we will!

\u25cf      Drive to build something amazing

\u25cf      Be excited about data and coding

\u25cf      Have strong opinions, but hold them loosely

 

What will you be doing?

As a seed-stage team member, you will be working on a greenfield application and ML models. You will be an integral part of the design and architecture decision process, working directly with the other team members and leadership (we have a very flat structure). In this role you will have a huge impact on the success of the company.


Minimum Qualifications

- At least 4 years of experience as a Data Scientist / Researcher / ML Engineer

- Hands-on experience building ML/DL models 

- Master's degree or equivalent in a STEM field 


Preferred Qualifications

- MLOps and data engineering experience

- Familiarity with the DevOps ecosysetm

- Experience with NLP, anomaliy detetion

- PhD in a STEM field
